body.name: BOTANIC HEARTH Peppermint Oil Shampoo - Hair Blooming Formula with Keratin for Thinning Hair - Fights Hair Loss, Promotes Hair Growth - Sulfate Free for Men and Women - 16 fl oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 23 hrs 12 mins
features: Deep Cleansing : The Botanic Hearth Peppermint Oil Shampoo is known for its refreshing scent which leaves hair and scalp feeling clean, refreshed, and invigorated
Helps Promote Hair Thickening : The Peppermint Oil Shampoo comes with Keratin Protein that helps hair become thicker and stronger thereby fighting breakage
Helps Promote Hair Growth : Get visibly healthier hair and fight hair loss with expert formulated hair blooming formula that includes Vitamin E & H, Peppermint, Tea Tree, Argan, and Coconut Oil
Soothes Rough, Dry and Damaged Hair : Peppermint is known for its soothing and cooling properties, which can help relieve itchiness, irritation, and inflammation on the scalp
Ethically Sourced & Cruelty-free : Botanic Hearth products are made or packaged in the USA, safe, healthy, sulfate-free, paraben-free, and cruelty-free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024

reviews.reviewerName: Muy buena, y si cumple con mis espectativas, sencilla pero funcional . Gracias . Siempre es un privilegio comprar con ustedes , por su seriedad y calidad, sigan así.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Me a ayudado mucho
reviews.reviewText: Es muy bueno, hacia tiempo que buscaba un shampoo para mí cabello y he probado varios , este me ha resuelto mi problema de la resequedad que tenía,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We recently tried the shampoo/conditioner combo and the set was ok overall, but my better half likes the shampoo more than the conditioner, so we got additional bottles of the shampoo. To me, the shampoo has a pretty strong tea tree smell instead of a peppermint, which I would have preferred. I am not sure if this is because this product has sat too long on the shelf or the brand has inconsistent quality control standards. It does have a minty sensation on the scalp when put on and seems to lather well. The shampoo seems to clean well. The quality of the shampoo is ok. I think this is a bit expensive for shampoo though.4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really skeptical that any shampoo could help with my thinning hair, but this one really has helped.Been using it for a couple of months now, and my hair really looks and feels thicker. It also helps prevent breakage. I rarely find hair on my bathroom floor anymore.I’m a 71 year old woman with hair past my shoulders…and can now say THICKER hair past my shoulders.Maybe I won’t go bald after all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wish ot smelled better
reviews.reviewText: I just got it and have not used it yet. I have to say, I'm afraid to. I thought it was going to have a refreshing peppermint smell. But it smells more like being at an indoor pool that is clorinated... with a hint of bathroom. Disappointed about the smell and not excited to use it, but I might give it a shot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this for several months...seems like it was working. There wasnt as much hair loss in the shower and my hair looks thicker were it was thinning. When I then ran out...I started to use another brand a little cheaper. Once again I noticed more hair in shower and my hair looking thinner. I decided to reorder this set and am very happy with this product. It even helped my aging mother...who was losing alot of hair each time she showered and combed her hair. With this shampoo and conditioner it has slowed down her hair loss considerably. Also looks and feels thicker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Doesn’t lather up much, scent is very mild
reviews.reviewText: Visited a nice resort and they had a great smelling combo of shampoos and conditioners in this scent. They were very expensive, so I took a chance on this brand of shampoo and it wasn’t worth it. I ended up buzzing my hair because I had a whole bottle to go thru and it stills feels dry as it barely lathers up. The search continues for a reasonably priced alternative.
